display_help: Enhances the to hit debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.ToHit.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into to hit debuff powers that require a to hit check.
